description.summary: Al-Khidr (also Al-Khadir, Al-Khidhr, Al-Khader; الخضر \"The Green One\") is one of the most enigmatic and widely venerated figures in Islamic tradition and broader Middle Eastern folklore.
description.full: Al-Khidr (also Al-Khadir, Al-Khidhr, Al-Khader; الخضر \"The Green One\") is one of the most enigmatic and widely venerated figures in Islamic tradition and broader Middle Eastern folklore. Described as an immortal sage, prophet, or saint with special knowledge from God, Al-Khidr appears in the Quran (Surah Al-Kahf) as a mysterious teacher who instructs the prophet Moses in divine wisdom through seemingly paradoxical actions.
